title.vi: A1-08 — Be + Tính Từ: Cảm Xúc & Miêu Tả

content.en: This room teaches you how to use be with adjectives to describe feelings and simple characteristics. You will practice short lines like I am happy and She is tired. These patterns help you communicate emotions and basic descriptions in daily life. Speak slowly and keep your voice soft and steady.
content.vi: Phòng này dạy bạn dùng be với tính từ để diễn tả cảm xúc và miêu tả đơn giản. Bạn sẽ luyện các câu ngắn như I am happy và She is tired. Những mẫu này giúp bạn giao tiếp cảm xúc và miêu tả cơ bản trong đời sống. Hãy nói chậm và giữ giọng nhẹ nhàng, đều.

copy.en:
Practice these lines.
I am happy.
I am sad.
I am tired.
I am angry.
Say each feeling clearly.
Soft voice is okay.
copy.vi: Luyện các câu sau: I am happy, I am sad, I am tired, I am angry. Nói rõ từng cảm xúc. Giọng nhẹ nhàng là tốt.

copy.en:
Practice describing others.
He is tall.
She is short.
He is funny.
She is friendly.
Say each line slowly.
Do not rush.
copy.vi: Luyện miêu tả người khác: He is tall, She is short, He is funny, She is friendly. Đọc chậm rãi. Đừng vội.

copy.en:
Practice these useful adjectives.
happy
sad
tired
busy
hungry
late
Speak each word clearly.
Feel the ending sound.
copy.vi: Luyện các tính từ hữu ích: happy, sad, tired, busy, hungry, late. Phát âm rõ từng từ và chú ý âm cuối.

copy.en:
Read these short lines.
She is kind.
He is quiet.
They are busy.
We are ready.
Simple lines help you speak naturally.
copy.vi: Hãy đọc các câu sau: She is kind, He is quiet, They are busy, We are ready. Câu đơn giản giúp bạn nói tự nhiên hơn.

copy.en:
Practice daily expressions.
I am busy today.
I am hungry now.
He is tired after work.
She is happy today.
Say everything slowly.
copy.vi: Luyện các câu trong đời sống: I am busy today, I am hungry now, He is tired after work, She is happy today. Nói mọi câu thật chậm.

copy.en:
Repeat this drill.
I am happy.
You are ready.
He is busy.
She is calm.
We are strong.
They are friendly.
Calm repetition builds confident speaking.
copy.vi: Luyện đoạn sau: I am happy, You are ready, He is busy, She is calm, We are strong, They are friendly. Lặp lại bình tĩnh để nói tự tin hơn.
